summary: Frontend testing complete for Brackett Agency website with hero images and 'Our Guarantee' headline fix. All 8 pages have hero images displaying correctly, the 'Our Guarantee' section on /how-we-work now shows 'WHY CHOOSE BRACKETT' subtitle and 'Our Guarantee' headline above the three cards, all navigation links work, and CTA buttons correctly link to JotForm.

'Our Guarantee' section shows 'WHY CHOOSE BRACKETT' subtitle (gold text, uppercase)
'Our Guarantee' section shows 'Our Guarantee' headline (white text, h2 element)
'Our Guarantee' section displays 3 cards: Outcome Commitment, Technology Advantage, Senior Execution
All 8 navigation links work (Home, How We Work, Solutions, Brand & Design, Intelligence, Insights, About, Contact)
Primary CTA button links to JotForm (https://form.jotform.com/252728460666061)
Nav CTA button links to JotForm correctly
Secondary CTA 'Explore Our Approach' navigates to /how-we-work
Hero images positioned correctly on right side on desktop
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 pages have hero images from Unsplash/Pexels displaying correctly.
